login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.cardDescription: Enter your email and password to access your account

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Join us to get started
register.cardDescription: Create your account to get started

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link
resetPassword.cardDescription: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions

emailSent.title: Check your email
emailSent.subtitle: We sent a password reset link to
emailSent.instruction: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.

resetPassword.notImplemented: Failed to send reset email. This feature is not yet implemented.

profile.title: Profile
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.viewInfo: View and manage your account information
profile.updateInfo: Update your personal information and preferences

password.title: Change Password
password.subtitle: Update your account password
password.cardDescription: Choose a strong password to keep your account secure

securityTip.title: Security Tip:
securityTip.description: Use a unique password that you don't use anywhere else. Consider using a password manager to generate and store strong passwords securely.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage users and monitor system activity
dashboard.error: Failed to load admin data. Please try refreshing the page.

users.title: User Management
users.description: View and manage all system users
users.searchPlaceholder: Search users by name or email...

create.title: Create New User
create.subtitle: Add a new user to the system

notes.title: Important Notes:
notes.password: The user will need to change their password on first login.
notes.email: A welcome email will be sent to the user's email address.
notes.verification: The user will need to verify their email address before full access is granted.
notes.admin: Admin users have full access to all system features and user management.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errors.AUTH_USER_NOT_FOUND: No account found with this email address.
errors.AUTH_ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Account is temporarily locked. Please try again later.
errors.AUTH_ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
errors.AUTH_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.AUTH_EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email address is already registered. Try signing in instead.
errors.AUTH_WEAK_PASSWORD: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
errors.AUTH_INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check your input and try again.
errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.TIMEOUT_ERROR: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.AUTH_INVALID_TOKEN: Invalid or expired reset token. Please request a new password reset.
errors.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Reset token has expired. Please request a new password reset.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission to access this page.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
